mapper.select: select w.*,u.uname from weekly w,users u where w.uid = u.uid
select w.*,u.uname from weekly w,users u where w.uid = u.uid and w.wscore is not null
select w.*,u.uname from weekly w,users u where w.uid = u.uid and wid=#{wid}
